short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically cleans cookies at set intervals for enhanced privacy and performance.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Cookie Auto Cleaner is a Chrome extension designed to automatically clean cookies at specified intervals. It features a user-friendly interface where you can easily set the cleaning interval and also provides a manual option to instantly remove unwanted cookies. By optimizing browser performance and enhancing privacy, this extension offers a streamlined browsing experience with minimal resource usage and a modern design.
